QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT CLAIM.ROWID AS RECORDID, CLAIM.NCLAIM, CLAIM.NCLAIM, CLAIM.NBRANCH, TABLE101.SDESCRIPT AS NBRANCHDESC, CLAIM.NPRODUCT, PRODMASTER2.SDESCRIPT AS NPRODUCTDESC, CLAIM.NPOLICY, CLAIM.NCERTIF, CLAIM.NCLAIM, CLAIM.DDECLADAT, CLAIM.SCLAIMTYP, TABLE1323.SDESCRIPT AS SCLAIMTYPDESC, CLAIM.NCAUSECOD, CLAIM_CAUS4.SDESCRIPT AS NCAUSECODDESC, CLAIM.SSTACLAIM, TABLE1355.SDESCRIPT AS SSTACLAIMDESC, CLAIM.DPRESCDAT, CLAIM.DOCCURDAT, CLAIM.NLOC_RESERV, CLAIM.NLOC_REC_AM, CLAIM.NLOC_PAY_AM, CLAIM.NLOC_OUT_AM, CLAIM.NLOC_COS_RE, CLAIM.NIDCATAS FROM CLAIM LEFT JOIN TABLE10 TABLE101 ON TABLE101.NBRANCH = CLAIM.NBRANCH LEFT JOIN PRODMASTER PRODMASTER2 ON PRODMASTER2.NBRANCH = CLAIM.NBRANCH AND PRODMASTER2.NPRODUCT = CLAIM.NPRODUCT LEFT JOIN TABLE132 TABLE1323 ON TABLE1323.SCLAIMTYP = CLAIM.SCLAIMTYP LEFT JOIN CLAIM_CAUS CLAIM_CAUS4 ON CLAIM_CAUS4.NBRANCH = CLAIM.NBRANCH AND CLAIM_CAUS4.NPRODUCT = CLAIM.NPRODUCT AND CLAIM_CAUS4.NCAUSECOD = CLAIM.NCAUSECOD LEFT JOIN TABLE135 TABLE1355 ON TABLE1355.SSTACLAIM = CLAIM.SSTACLAIM WHERE ((CLAIM.NCLAIM = [SINIESTRO])) ORDER BY CLAIM.NCLAIM
QueryStatements.RetrieveByKey: SELECT CLAIM.ROWID AS RECORDID, CLAIM.NCLAIM, CLAIM.NCLAIM, CLAIM.NBRANCH, TABLE101.SDESCRIPT AS NBRANCHDESC, CLAIM.NPRODUCT, PRODMASTER2.SDESCRIPT AS NPRODUCTDESC, CLAIM.NPOLICY, CLAIM.NCERTIF, CLAIM.NCLAIM, CLAIM.DDECLADAT, CLAIM.SCLAIMTYP, TABLE1323.SDESCRIPT AS SCLAIMTYPDESC, CLAIM.NCAUSECOD, CLAIM_CAUS4.SDESCRIPT AS NCAUSECODDESC, CLAIM.SSTACLAIM, TABLE1355.SDESCRIPT AS SSTACLAIMDESC, CLAIM.DPRESCDAT, CLAIM.DOCCURDAT, CLAIM.NLOC_RESERV, CLAIM.NLOC_REC_AM, CLAIM.NLOC_PAY_AM, CLAIM.NLOC_OUT_AM, CLAIM.NLOC_COS_RE, CLAIM.NIDCATAS FROM CLAIM LEFT JOIN TABLE10 TABLE101 ON TABLE101.NBRANCH = CLAIM.NBRANCH LEFT JOIN PRODMASTER PRODMASTER2 ON PRODMASTER2.NBRANCH = CLAIM.NBRANCH AND PRODMASTER2.NPRODUCT = CLAIM.NPRODUCT LEFT JOIN TABLE132 TABLE1323 ON TABLE1323.SCLAIMTYP = CLAIM.SCLAIMTYP LEFT JOIN CLAIM_CAUS CLAIM_CAUS4 ON CLAIM_CAUS4.NBRANCH = CLAIM.NBRANCH AND CLAIM_CAUS4.NPRODUCT = CLAIM.NPRODUCT AND CLAIM_CAUS4.NCAUSECOD = CLAIM.NCAUSECOD LEFT JOIN TABLE135 TABLE1355 ON TABLE1355.SSTACLAIM = CLAIM.SSTACLAIM WHERE CLAIM.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM}

ToolTip.Value: Código del ramo comercial.
Code of the line of business.
Código del producto.
Code of the product.
Número que identifica la póliza/cotización/solicitud.
Number identifying the Policy/Quotation/Application.
Número del certificado.
Number identifying the certificate.
Número que identifica al siniestro.
Claim number.
Fecha de declaración.
Date when the Claim was made.
Tipo de pérdida del siniestro.
Type of loss in the claim.
Código de la causa del siniestro.
Code of cause of the claim.
Claim status.
Fecha de prescripción del siniestro.
Date when the claim will be closed (will lapse) if the requirements are not received.
Fecha y hora de ocurrencia del siniestro.
Date and hour when the loss occurred.
Monto de reserva actual (en moneda local).
Current reserve amount (in local currency).
Monto total recuperado (en moneda local).
Amount recovered (in local currency).
Monto pagado (en moneda local).
Amount paid on the reserve (in local currency).
Monto pendiente de la reserva (en moneda local).
Outstanding reserve amount (in local currency).
Monto total de gastos de recuperación (en moneda local).
Total amount of recovery expenses (in local currency).
Número identificativo del evento catastrófico.
Code that identifies an catastrophic event.

QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT CLAIM_CASE.ROWID AS RECORDID, CLAIM_CASE.NCLAIM,CLAIM_CASE.NCASE_NUM,CLAIM_CASE.NDEMAN_TYPE, CLAIM_CASE.NCLAIM, CLAIM_CASE.NDEMAN_TYPE, CLAIM_CASE.NCASE_NUM, CLAIM_CASE.NDEMAN_TYPE, TABLE6921.SDESCRIPT AS NDEMAN_TYPEDESC, CLAIM_CASE.SSTACASE, TABLE1352.SDESCRIPT AS SSTACASEDESC, CLAIM_CASE.NNOTEDAMA FROM CLAIM_CASE LEFT JOIN TABLE692 TABLE6921 ON TABLE6921.NDEMAN_TYPE = CLAIM_CASE.NDEMAN_TYPE LEFT JOIN TABLE135 TABLE1352 ON TABLE1352.SSTACLAIM = CLAIM_CASE.SSTACASE WHERE CLAIM_CASE.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} ORDER BY CLAIM_CASE.NCLAIM, CLAIM_CASE.NCASE_NUM, CLAIM_CASE.NDEMAN_TYPE
QueryStatements.RetrieveByKey: SELECT CLAIM_CASE.ROWID AS RECORDID, CLAIM_CASE.NCLAIM,CLAIM_CASE.NCASE_NUM,CLAIM_CASE.NDEMAN_TYPE, CLAIM_CASE.NCLAIM, CLAIM_CASE.NDEMAN_TYPE, CLAIM_CASE.NCASE_NUM, CLAIM_CASE.NDEMAN_TYPE, TABLE6921.SDESCRIPT AS NDEMAN_TYPEDESC, CLAIM_CASE.SSTACASE, TABLE1352.SDESCRIPT AS SSTACASEDESC, CLAIM_CASE.NNOTEDAMA FROM CLAIM_CASE LEFT JOIN TABLE692 TABLE6921 ON TABLE6921.NDEMAN_TYPE = CLAIM_CASE.NDEMAN_TYPE LEFT JOIN TABLE135 TABLE1352 ON TABLE1352.SSTACLAIM = CLAIM_CASE.SSTACASE WHERE CLAIM_CASE.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} AND CLAIM_CASE.NCASE_NUM = {NCASE_NUM} AND CLAIM_CASE.NDEMAN_TYPE = {NDEMAN_TYPE}
QueryStatements.IsExist: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIM_CASE WHERE CLAIM_CASE.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM}

QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT DISTINCT CL_COVER.ROWID AS RECORDID, CL_COVER.NCLAIM,CL_COVER.NCASE_NUM,CL_COVER.NDEMAN_TYPE,CL_COVER.NMODULEC,CL_COVER.NCOVER,CL_COVER.NCURRENCY,CL_COVER.SCLIENT, CL_COVER.NCASE_NUM, CL_COVER.NMODULEC, CL_COVER.NCOVER, CL_COVER.SCLIENT, CLIENT1.SCLIENAME AS SCLIENTDESC, CL_COVER.NDEMAN_TYPE, TABLE6922.SDESCRIPT AS NDEMAN_TYPEDESC, CL_COVER.NDAMPROF, CL_COVER.SRESERVSTAT, CL_COVER.NRESERVE, CL_COVER.NREC_AMOUNT, CL_COVER.NPAY_AMOUNT, CL_COVER.NLOC_COS_RE, CL_COVER.SFRANTYPE, TABLE643.SDESCRIPT AS SFRANTYPEDESC, CL_COVER.NFRA_AMOUNT, CL_COVER.NCURRENCY, TABLE114.SDESCRIPT AS NCURRENCYDESC FROM CL_COVER LEFT JOIN CLIENT CLIENT1 ON CLIENT1.SCLIENT = CL_COVER.SCLIENT LEFT JOIN TABLE692 TABLE6922 ON TABLE6922.NDEMAN_TYPE = CL_COVER.NDEMAN_TYPE LEFT JOIN TABLE64 TABLE643 ON TABLE643.SFRANTYPE = CL_COVER.SFRANTYPE LEFT JOIN TABLE11 TABLE114 ON TABLE114.NCODIGINT = CL_COVER.NCURRENCY LEFT JOIN CLAIM_CASE CLAIM_CASE5 ON CLAIM_CASE5.NCLAIM = CL_COVER.NCLAIM AND CLAIM_CASE5.NCASE_NUM = CL_COVER.NCASE_NUM AND CLAIM_CASE5.NDEMAN_TYPE = CL_COVER.NDEMAN_TYPE LEFT JOIN CLAIM CLAIM6 ON CLAIM6.NCLAIM = CLAIM_CASE5.NCLAIM WHERE CL_COVER.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} AND CL_COVER.NCASE_NUM = {NCASE_NUM} AND CL_COVER.NDEMAN_TYPE = {NDEMAN_TYPE} ORDER BY CL_COVER.NCLAIM, CL_COVER.NCASE_NUM, CL_COVER.NDEMAN_TYPE, CL_COVER.NMODULEC, CL_COVER.NCOVER, CL_COVER.NCURRENCY, CL_COVER.SCLIENT
QueryStatements.RetrieveByKey: SELECT DISTINCT CL_COVER.ROWID AS RECORDID, CL_COVER.NCLAIM,CL_COVER.NCASE_NUM,CL_COVER.NDEMAN_TYPE,CL_COVER.NMODULEC,CL_COVER.NCOVER,CL_COVER.NCURRENCY,CL_COVER.SCLIENT, CL_COVER.NCASE_NUM, CL_COVER.NMODULEC, CL_COVER.NCOVER, CL_COVER.SCLIENT, CLIENT1.SCLIENAME AS SCLIENTDESC, CL_COVER.NDEMAN_TYPE, TABLE6922.SDESCRIPT AS NDEMAN_TYPEDESC, CL_COVER.NDAMPROF, CL_COVER.SRESERVSTAT, CL_COVER.NRESERVE, CL_COVER.NREC_AMOUNT, CL_COVER.NPAY_AMOUNT, CL_COVER.NLOC_COS_RE, CL_COVER.SFRANTYPE, TABLE643.SDESCRIPT AS SFRANTYPEDESC, CL_COVER.NFRA_AMOUNT, CL_COVER.NCURRENCY, TABLE114.SDESCRIPT AS NCURRENCYDESC FROM CL_COVER LEFT JOIN CLIENT CLIENT1 ON CLIENT1.SCLIENT = CL_COVER.SCLIENT LEFT JOIN TABLE692 TABLE6922 ON TABLE6922.NDEMAN_TYPE = CL_COVER.NDEMAN_TYPE LEFT JOIN TABLE64 TABLE643 ON TABLE643.SFRANTYPE = CL_COVER.SFRANTYPE LEFT JOIN TABLE11 TABLE114 ON TABLE114.NCODIGINT = CL_COVER.NCURRENCY LEFT JOIN CLAIM_CASE CLAIM_CASE5 ON CLAIM_CASE5.NCLAIM = CL_COVER.NCLAIM AND CLAIM_CASE5.NCASE_NUM = CL_COVER.NCASE_NUM AND CLAIM_CASE5.NDEMAN_TYPE = CL_COVER.NDEMAN_TYPE LEFT JOIN CLAIM CLAIM6 ON CLAIM6.NCLAIM = CLAIM_CASE5.NCLAIM WHERE CL_COVER.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} AND CL_COVER.NCASE_NUM = {NCASE_NUM} AND CL_COVER.NDEMAN_TYPE = {NDEMAN_TYPE} AND CL_COVER.NMODULEC = {NMODULEC} AND CL_COVER.NCOVER = {NCOVER} AND CL_COVER.NCURRENCY = {NCURRENCY} AND CL_COVER.SCLIENT = '{SCLIENT}'
QueryStatements.IsExist: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) FROM CL_COVER LEFT JOIN CLAIM_CASE CLAIM_CASE1 ON CLAIM_CASE1.NCLAIM = CL_COVER.NCLAIM AND CLAIM_CASE1.NCASE_NUM = CL_COVER.NCASE_NUM AND CLAIM_CASE1.NDEMAN_TYPE = CL_COVER.NDEMAN_TYPE LEFT JOIN CLAIM CLAIM2 ON CLAIM2.NCLAIM = CLAIM_CASE1.NCLAIM WHERE CL_COVER.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} AND CL_COVER.NCASE_NUM = {NCASE_NUM} AND CL_COVER.NDEMAN_TYPE = {NDEMAN_TYPE}

QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT CLAIM_ATTM.ROWID AS RECORDID, CLAIM_ATTM.NCLAIM,CLAIM_ATTM.NCASE_NUM,CLAIM_ATTM.NDEMAN_TYPE,CLAIM_ATTM.DEFFECDATE, CLAIM_ATTM.NCASE_NUM, CLAIM_ATTM.NDEMAN_TYPE, TABLE6921.SDESCRIPT AS NDEMAN_TYPEDESC, CLAIM_ATTM.SCLIENT, CLIENT2.SCLIENAME AS SCLIENTDESC, CLAIM_ATTM.NSERVICE, CLAIM_ATTM.SILLNESS, TAB_AM_ILL3.SDESCRIPT AS SILLNESSDESC, CLAIM_ATTM.SCLIENTPROF, CLIENT4.SCLIENAME AS SCLIENTPROFDESC FROM CLAIM_ATTM LEFT JOIN TABLE692 TABLE6921 ON TABLE6921.NDEMAN_TYPE = CLAIM_ATTM.NDEMAN_TYPE LEFT JOIN CLIENT CLIENT2 ON CLIENT2.SCLIENT = CLAIM_ATTM.SCLIENT LEFT JOIN TAB_AM_ILL TAB_AM_ILL3 ON TAB_AM_ILL3.SILLNESS = CLAIM_ATTM.SILLNESS LEFT JOIN CLIENT CLIENT4 ON CLIENT4.SCLIENT = CLAIM_ATTM.SCLIENT WHERE CLAIM_ATTM.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} AND CLAIM_ATTM.NCASE_NUM = {NCASE_NUM} AND CLAIM_ATTM.NDEMAN_TYPE = {NDEMAN_TYPE} AND CLAIM_ATTM.DEFFECDATE <= '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]' AND (CLAIM_ATTM.DNULLDATE IS NULL OR CLAIM_ATTM.DNULLDATE > '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]') ORDER BY CLAIM_ATTM.NCLAIM, CLAIM_ATTM.NCASE_NUM, CLAIM_ATTM.NDEMAN_TYPE, CLAIM_ATTM.DEFFECDATE
QueryStatements.RetrieveByKey: SELECT CLAIM_ATTM.ROWID AS RECORDID, CLAIM_ATTM.NCLAIM,CLAIM_ATTM.NCASE_NUM,CLAIM_ATTM.NDEMAN_TYPE,CLAIM_ATTM.DEFFECDATE, CLAIM_ATTM.NCASE_NUM, CLAIM_ATTM.NDEMAN_TYPE, TABLE6921.SDESCRIPT AS NDEMAN_TYPEDESC, CLAIM_ATTM.SCLIENT, CLIENT2.SCLIENAME AS SCLIENTDESC, CLAIM_ATTM.NSERVICE, CLAIM_ATTM.SILLNESS, TAB_AM_ILL3.SDESCRIPT AS SILLNESSDESC, CLAIM_ATTM.SCLIENTPROF, CLIENT4.SCLIENAME AS SCLIENTPROFDESC FROM CLAIM_ATTM LEFT JOIN TABLE692 TABLE6921 ON TABLE6921.NDEMAN_TYPE = CLAIM_ATTM.NDEMAN_TYPE LEFT JOIN CLIENT CLIENT2 ON CLIENT2.SCLIENT = CLAIM_ATTM.SCLIENT LEFT JOIN TAB_AM_ILL TAB_AM_ILL3 ON TAB_AM_ILL3.SILLNESS = CLAIM_ATTM.SILLNESS LEFT JOIN CLIENT CLIENT4 ON CLIENT4.SCLIENT = CLAIM_ATTM.SCLIENT WHERE CLAIM_ATTM.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} AND CLAIM_ATTM.NCASE_NUM = {NCASE_NUM} AND CLAIM_ATTM.NDEMAN_TYPE = {NDEMAN_TYPE} AND CLAIM_ATTM.DEFFECDATE = '{DEFFECDATE:D}' AND CLAIM_ATTM.DEFFECDATE <= '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]' AND (CLAIM_ATTM.DNULLDATE IS NULL OR CLAIM_ATTM.DNULLDATE > '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]')
QueryStatements.IsExist: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIM_ATTM WHERE CLAIM_ATTM.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} AND CLAIM_ATTM.NCASE_NUM = {NCASE_NUM} AND CLAIM_ATTM.NDEMAN_TYPE = {NDEMAN_TYPE} AND CLAIM_ATTM.DEFFECDATE <= '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]' AND (CLAIM_ATTM.DNULLDATE IS NULL OR CLAIM_ATTM.DNULLDATE > '[RECORDEFFECTIVEDATE]')

QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT CLAIM_AUTO.ROWID AS RECORDID, CLAIM_AUTO.NCLAIM,CLAIM_AUTO.NCASE_NUM,CLAIM_AUTO.NDEMAN_TYPE, CLAIM_AUTO.NDEMAN_TYPE, CLAIM_AUTO.NCASE_NUM, CLAIM_AUTO.NDEMAN_TYPE, TABLE6921.SDESCRIPT AS NDEMAN_TYPEDESC, DECODE(CLAIM_AUTO.SALCOHOLIC, '1', 1, '2', 0, NULL, 0) AS SALCOHOLIC, DECODE(CLAIM_AUTO.SPOLICEDEM, '1', 1, '2', 0, NULL, 0) AS SPOLICEDEM, CLAIM_AUTO.NINFRACTION, CLAIM_AUTO.NAUTO_QUANT, CLAIM_AUTO.NNOTENUM FROM CLAIM_AUTO LEFT JOIN TABLE692 TABLE6921 ON TABLE6921.NDEMAN_TYPE = CLAIM_AUTO.NDEMAN_TYPE WHERE CLAIM_AUTO.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} AND CLAIM_AUTO.NCASE_NUM = {NCASE_NUM} AND CLAIM_AUTO.NDEMAN_TYPE = {NDEMAN_TYPE} ORDER BY CLAIM_AUTO.NCLAIM, CLAIM_AUTO.NCASE_NUM, CLAIM_AUTO.NDEMAN_TYPE

QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT CLAIM_DAMA.ROWID AS RECORDID, CLAIM_DAMA.NCLAIM,CLAIM_DAMA.NCASE_NUM,CLAIM_DAMA.NDEMAN_TYPE,CLAIM_DAMA.NDAMAGE_COD, CLAIM_DAMA.NDAMAGE_COD, CLAIM_DAMA.NDAMAGE_COD, TABLE55791.SDESCRIPT AS NDAMAGE_CODDESC, CLAIM_DAMA.NMAG_DAM, TABLE56742.SDESCRIPT AS NMAG_DAMDESC, CLAIM_DAMA.NAMOUNT FROM CLAIM_DAMA LEFT JOIN TABLE5579 TABLE55791 ON TABLE55791.NAUTO_PART = CLAIM_DAMA.NDAMAGE_COD LEFT JOIN TABLE5674 TABLE56742 ON TABLE56742.NMAG_DAM = CLAIM_DAMA.NMAG_DAM WHERE CLAIM_DAMA.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} AND CLAIM_DAMA.NCASE_NUM = {NCASE_NUM} AND CLAIM_DAMA.NDEMAN_TYPE = {NDEMAN_TYPE} ORDER BY CLAIM_DAMA.NCLAIM, CLAIM_DAMA.NCASE_NUM, CLAIM_DAMA.NDEMAN_TYPE, CLAIM_DAMA.NDAMAGE_COD

QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT CLAIM_THIR.ROWID AS RECORDID, CLAIM_THIR.NCLAIM,CLAIM_THIR.NCASE_NUM,CLAIM_THIR.NDEMAN_TYPE, CLAIM_THIR.NDEMAN_TYPE, CLAIM_THIR.SLICENSE_TY, TABLE801.SDESCRIPT AS SLICENSE_TYDESC, CLAIM_THIR.SREGIST, CLAIM_THIR.SCHASSIS, CLAIM_THIR.SMOTOR, CLAIM_THIR.STHIR_POLIC, CLAIM_THIR.STHIR_CLAIM, DECODE(CLAIM_THIR.SRECOV_IND, '1', 1, '2', 0, NULL, 0) AS SRECOV_IND, CLAIM_THIR.NTHIR_COMP, CLAIM_THIR.NBLAME, TABLE2042.SDESCRIPT AS NBLAMEDESC FROM CLAIM_THIR LEFT JOIN TABLE80 TABLE801 ON TABLE801.SLICENSE_TY = CLAIM_THIR.SLICENSE_TY LEFT JOIN TABLE204 TABLE2042 ON TABLE2042.NBLAME = CLAIM_THIR.NBLAME WHERE CLAIM_THIR.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} AND CLAIM_THIR.NCASE_NUM = {NCASE_NUM} AND CLAIM_THIR.NDEMAN_TYPE = {NDEMAN_TYPE} ORDER BY CLAIM_THIR.NCLAIM, CLAIM_THIR.NCASE_NUM, CLAIM_THIR.NDEMAN_TYPE

caption.Value: Send Check to This Branch Office

Remark.Value: Client roles associated with a claim.

QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT CLAIM_HIS.ROWID AS RECORDID, CLAIM_HIS.NCLAIM,CLAIM_HIS.NCASE_NUM,CLAIM_HIS.NDEMAN_TYPE,CLAIM_HIS.NTRANSAC, CLAIM_HIS.NTRANSAC, CLAIM_HIS.NCASE_NUM, CLAIM_HIS.DOPERDATE, CLAIM_HIS.NTRANSAC, CLAIM_HIS.SCLIENT, CLIENT1.SCLIENAME AS SCLIENTDESC, CLAIM_HIS.NOPER_TYPE, TABLE1402.SDESCRIPT AS NOPER_TYPEDESC, CLAIM_HIS.NPAY_TYPE, TABLE1993.SDESCRIPT AS NPAY_TYPEDESC, CLAIM_HIS.NPAY_FORM, TABLE1384.SDESCRIPT AS NPAY_FORMDESC, CLAIM_HIS.NSERV_ORDER, DECODE(CLAIM_HIS.SIND_ORDER, '1', 1, '2', 0, NULL, 0) AS SIND_ORDER, CLAIM_HIS.SORDER_NUM, DECODE(CLAIM_HIS.SEXECUTED, '1', 1, '2', 0, NULL, 0) AS SEXECUTED, CLAIM_HIS.NAMOUNT, CLAIM_HIS.NCURRENCY, TABLE115.SDESCRIPT AS NCURRENCYDESC FROM CLAIM_HIS LEFT JOIN CLIENT CLIENT1 ON CLIENT1.SCLIENT = CLAIM_HIS.SCLIENT LEFT JOIN TABLE140 TABLE1402 ON TABLE1402.NOPER_TYPE = CLAIM_HIS.NOPER_TYPE LEFT JOIN TABLE199 TABLE1993 ON TABLE1993.NPAY_TYPE = CLAIM_HIS.NPAY_TYPE LEFT JOIN TABLE138 TABLE1384 ON TABLE1384.NPAY_FORM = CLAIM_HIS.NPAY_FORM LEFT JOIN TABLE11 TABLE115 ON TABLE115.NCODIGINT = CLAIM_HIS.NCURRENCY WHERE CLAIM_HIS.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} AND CLAIM_HIS.NCASE_NUM = {NCASE_NUM} AND CLAIM_HIS.NDEMAN_TYPE = {NDEMAN_TYPE} ORDER BY CLAIM_HIS.NCLAIM, CLAIM_HIS.NCASE_NUM, CLAIM_HIS.NDEMAN_TYPE, CLAIM_HIS.NTRANSAC
QueryStatements.RetrieveByKey: SELECT CLAIM_HIS.ROWID AS RECORDID, CLAIM_HIS.NCLAIM,CLAIM_HIS.NCASE_NUM,CLAIM_HIS.NDEMAN_TYPE,CLAIM_HIS.NTRANSAC, CLAIM_HIS.NTRANSAC, CLAIM_HIS.NCASE_NUM, CLAIM_HIS.DOPERDATE, CLAIM_HIS.NTRANSAC, CLAIM_HIS.SCLIENT, CLIENT1.SCLIENAME AS SCLIENTDESC, CLAIM_HIS.NOPER_TYPE, TABLE1402.SDESCRIPT AS NOPER_TYPEDESC, CLAIM_HIS.NPAY_TYPE, TABLE1993.SDESCRIPT AS NPAY_TYPEDESC, CLAIM_HIS.NPAY_FORM, TABLE1384.SDESCRIPT AS NPAY_FORMDESC, CLAIM_HIS.NSERV_ORDER, DECODE(CLAIM_HIS.SIND_ORDER, '1', 1, '2', 0, NULL, 0) AS SIND_ORDER, CLAIM_HIS.SORDER_NUM, DECODE(CLAIM_HIS.SEXECUTED, '1', 1, '2', 0, NULL, 0) AS SEXECUTED, CLAIM_HIS.NAMOUNT, CLAIM_HIS.NCURRENCY, TABLE115.SDESCRIPT AS NCURRENCYDESC FROM CLAIM_HIS LEFT JOIN CLIENT CLIENT1 ON CLIENT1.SCLIENT = CLAIM_HIS.SCLIENT LEFT JOIN TABLE140 TABLE1402 ON TABLE1402.NOPER_TYPE = CLAIM_HIS.NOPER_TYPE LEFT JOIN TABLE199 TABLE1993 ON TABLE1993.NPAY_TYPE = CLAIM_HIS.NPAY_TYPE LEFT JOIN TABLE138 TABLE1384 ON TABLE1384.NPAY_FORM = CLAIM_HIS.NPAY_FORM LEFT JOIN TABLE11 TABLE115 ON TABLE115.NCODIGINT = CLAIM_HIS.NCURRENCY WHERE CLAIM_HIS.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} AND CLAIM_HIS.NCASE_NUM = {NCASE_NUM} AND CLAIM_HIS.NDEMAN_TYPE = {NDEMAN_TYPE} AND CLAIM_HIS.NTRANSAC = {NTRANSAC}
QueryStatements.IsExist: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLAIM_HIS WHERE CLAIM_HIS.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} AND CLAIM_HIS.NCASE_NUM = {NCASE_NUM} AND CLAIM_HIS.NDEMAN_TYPE = {NDEMAN_TYPE}

QueryStatements.RetrieveAll: SELECT CHEQUES.ROWID AS RECORDID, CHEQUES.NREQUEST_NU,CHEQUES.SCHEQUE,CHEQUES.NCONSEC, CHEQUES.NREQUEST_NU, CHEQUES.NCONSEC, CHEQUES.SREQUEST_TY, TABLE1931.SDESCRIPT AS SREQUEST_TYDESC, CHEQUES.NREQUEST_NU, CHEQUES.SCHEQUE, CHEQUES.NCONCEPT, TABLE2932.SDESCRIPT AS NCONCEPTDESC, CHEQUES.NAMOUNT, CHEQUES.NCURRENCYPAY, CHEQUES.NSTA_CHEQUE, TABLE1873.SDESCRIPT AS NSTA_CHEQUEDESC, CHEQUES.DSTAT_DATE, CHEQUES.NOFFICEAGEN, TABLE55564.SDESCRIPT AS NOFFICEAGENDESC, CHEQUES.NAGENCY, CHEQUES.NTYPESUPPORT, TABLE55705.SDESCRIPT AS NTYPESUPPORTDESC, CHEQUES.NDOCSUPPORT, CHEQUES.SINTER_PAY, CLIENT6.SCLIENAME AS SINTER_PAYDESC, CHEQUES.NUSER_SOL, USERS7.SINITIALS AS NUSER_SOLDESC, CHEQUES.NQ_PAYS, CHEQUES.DNULLDATE, CHEQUES.DISSUE_DAT, CHEQUES.SDESCRIPT, CHEQUES.DDAT_PROPOS FROM CHEQUES LEFT JOIN TABLE193 TABLE1931 ON TABLE1931.SREQUEST_TY = CHEQUES.SREQUEST_TY LEFT JOIN TABLE293 TABLE2932 ON TABLE2932.NCONCEPT = CHEQUES.NCONCEPT LEFT JOIN TABLE187 TABLE1873 ON TABLE1873.NSTA_CHEQUE = CHEQUES.NSTA_CHEQUE LEFT JOIN TABLE5556 TABLE55564 ON TABLE55564.NOFFICEAGEN = CHEQUES.NOFFICEAGEN LEFT JOIN TABLE5570 TABLE55705 ON TABLE55705.NTYPESUPPORT = CHEQUES.NTYPESUPPORT LEFT JOIN CLIENT CLIENT6 ON CLIENT6.SCLIENT = CHEQUES.SCLIENT LEFT JOIN USERS USERS7 ON USERS7.NUSERCODE = CHEQUES.NUSERCODE WHERE CHEQUES.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM} ORDER BY CHEQUES.NREQUEST_NU, CHEQUES.SCHEQUE, CHEQUES.NCONSEC
QueryStatements.RetrieveByKey: SELECT CHEQUES.ROWID AS RECORDID, CHEQUES.NREQUEST_NU,CHEQUES.SCHEQUE,CHEQUES.NCONSEC, CHEQUES.NREQUEST_NU, CHEQUES.NCONSEC, CHEQUES.SREQUEST_TY, TABLE1931.SDESCRIPT AS SREQUEST_TYDESC, CHEQUES.NREQUEST_NU, CHEQUES.SCHEQUE, CHEQUES.NCONCEPT, TABLE2932.SDESCRIPT AS NCONCEPTDESC, CHEQUES.NAMOUNT, CHEQUES.NCURRENCYPAY, CHEQUES.NSTA_CHEQUE, TABLE1873.SDESCRIPT AS NSTA_CHEQUEDESC, CHEQUES.DSTAT_DATE, CHEQUES.NOFFICEAGEN, TABLE55564.SDESCRIPT AS NOFFICEAGENDESC, CHEQUES.NAGENCY, CHEQUES.NTYPESUPPORT, TABLE55705.SDESCRIPT AS NTYPESUPPORTDESC, CHEQUES.NDOCSUPPORT, CHEQUES.SINTER_PAY, CLIENT6.SCLIENAME AS SINTER_PAYDESC, CHEQUES.NUSER_SOL, USERS7.SINITIALS AS NUSER_SOLDESC, CHEQUES.NQ_PAYS, CHEQUES.DNULLDATE, CHEQUES.DISSUE_DAT, CHEQUES.SDESCRIPT, CHEQUES.DDAT_PROPOS FROM CHEQUES LEFT JOIN TABLE193 TABLE1931 ON TABLE1931.SREQUEST_TY = CHEQUES.SREQUEST_TY LEFT JOIN TABLE293 TABLE2932 ON TABLE2932.NCONCEPT = CHEQUES.NCONCEPT LEFT JOIN TABLE187 TABLE1873 ON TABLE1873.NSTA_CHEQUE = CHEQUES.NSTA_CHEQUE LEFT JOIN TABLE5556 TABLE55564 ON TABLE55564.NOFFICEAGEN = CHEQUES.NOFFICEAGEN LEFT JOIN TABLE5570 TABLE55705 ON TABLE55705.NTYPESUPPORT = CHEQUES.NTYPESUPPORT LEFT JOIN CLIENT CLIENT6 ON CLIENT6.SCLIENT = CHEQUES.SCLIENT LEFT JOIN USERS USERS7 ON USERS7.NUSERCODE = CHEQUES.NUSERCODE WHERE CHEQUES.NREQUEST_NU = {NREQUEST_NU} AND CHEQUES.SCHEQUE = '{SCHEQUE}' AND CHEQUES.NCONSEC = {NCONSEC} AND CHEQUES.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM}
QueryStatements.IsExist: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHEQUES WHERE CHEQUES.NCLAIM = {NCLAIM}

ToolTip.Value: Tipo de orden de pago.
Type of the payment order.
Número de la orden de pago.
Number of the payment order.
Número identificativo del cheque emitido por la compañía.
Number identifying the check issued by the insurance company.
Concepto por el cual se realiza la orden de pago.
Reason why the payment is requested.
Monto del pago solicitado.
Amount of the payment requested.
Código de la moneda de pago de la orden de pago.
Currency used in the payment.
Estado de la orden de pago.
Status of the payment order.
Fecha en que la orden de pago toma el estado indicado.
Date when the payment order takes on the status specified.
Código de la oficina donde el cliente busca el cheque que es generado para la orden de pago.
Code of Office where the client receives the check.
Código de la agencia donde el cliente busca el cheque que es generado para la orden de pago (este código identifica la sucursal y oficina).
Code of the agency where the client has to pick up the generated payment (this code also identifies branch office and field office).
Tipo de documento de respaldo o soporte.
Type of support document.
Número de documento soporte del pago.
Document number related to the payment.
Código del cliente a nombre de quien va a ser emitida la orden de pago.
Code of the client on whose name the order for payment will be issued.
Código del usuario que realiza la solicitud de orden de pago.
Code of the user requesting the payment order
Cantidad de pagos que se deben realizar bajo esta orden de pago (pagos periódicos).
Number of payments that will be issued under this payment order (periodical payments).
Fecha de anulación del registro.
Date when the record is cancelled.
Fecha de emisión de la póliza o certificado.
Date when the policy/certificate is issued

caption.Value: Descripción Breve de Razón de Pago

ToolTip.Value: Breve descripción de la razón por la que se solicita el pago.
Short description of the reason why the payment is requested.
Fecha de solicitud del pago.
Date when the payment was requested.
Claim number
Effective date
fecha de efecto
